Teddyox:

To add Comic Cover Thumbnails to your torrents:

Google the issue to find the Cover image, copy and go to:

http://bayimg.com/


Make sure to Mark:

Settings
[X] Resize to:
300x300 TPB - Torrent Image

It will give you an address with a 9-digit code at the end, JUST copy the 9-digit code and put that into the torrent image field. Make sure there isnt a space before as TPB loses its mind about that.

Also, if you're uploading an issue in a series, like GI JOE, please put links to previous issues in the description. Write it all in a txt file and copy/paste to torrent description to save time.

Also, Avoid apostrohpes and special characters in description as TPB again loses its mind about that.

Welcome to the Uploaders Club :)
@MrDowntown Thanks for the hints. I'll try better next time, but just happy to help out when i can.
